flavor_text_entries.black:
Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so
it can reduce damage by defensively
pulling its skin up to its neck.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It immediately headbutts anyone that
makes eye contact with it. Its skull is
massively thick.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Proud of its sturdy skull,
it suddenly headbutts everything,
but its weight makes it unstable, too.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Proud of its sturdy skull,
it suddenly headbutts everything,
but its weight makes it unstable, too.

Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce

its neck.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce
damage by defensively pulling its skin up to
its neck.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts
everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
They move in small groups, walking around lazily.
Anyone who makes eye contact gets smacked
with a headbutt.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
It stretches its saggy skin up to its neck to
protect itself. The saggier their skin, the more
respect they garner.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and
no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this
troublesome Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought
that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has
completely stretched out.
